reference.title: euca-create-route-table
reference.shortdesc: Creates a new VPC route table.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: euca-create-route-table [--show-empty-fields] [-U URL] [--region USER@REGION] [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--security-token TOKEN] [--debug] [--debugger] [--version] [-h] VPC_ID

row.entry: The ID of the VPC to create the route table in.

section.title: Example
section.p: The following example creates a new route table in a VPC with the identifier of vpc-15892437:
This command should produce output similar to the following:
section.codeblock: ROUTETABLE rtb-0ca8cac1 vpc-15892437 ROUTE local active 10.0.0.0/16 CreateRouteTable
